descr: "A container for a collection of resources."

fields.name: identifier
fields.descr: "A persistent identifier for the batch that won't change as a batch is copied from server to server."

fields.name: type
fields.descr: "Indicates the purpose of this bundle - how it was intended to be used."

fields.name: total
fields.descr: "If a set of search matches, this is the total number of matches for the search (as opposed to the number of results in this bundle)."

fields.name: link
fields.descr: "A series of links that provide context to this bundle."

fields.name: entry
fields.descr: "An entry in a bundle resource - will either contain a resource, or information about a resource (transactions and history only)."

fields.name: signature
fields.descr: "Digital Signature - base64 encoded. XML-DSIg or a JWT."

fields.name: id
fields.descr:
"The logical id of the resource, as used in the URL for the resource. Once assigned, this value never changes."
 derived from Resource

fields.name: meta
fields.descr:
"The metadata about the resource. This is content that is maintained by the infrastructure. Changes to the content may not always be associated with version changes to the resource."
 derived from Resource

fields.name: implicitRules
fields.descr:
"A reference to a set of rules that were followed when the resource was constructed, and which must be understood when processing the content."
 derived from Resource

fields.name: language
fields.descr:
"The base language in which the resource is written."
 derived from Resource

searches.name: composition
searches.descr: The first resource in the bundle, if the bundle type is "document" - this is a composition, and this parameter provides access to searches its contents

searches.name: message
searches.descr: The first resource in the bundle, if the bundle type is "message" - this is a message header, and this parameter provides access to search its contents

searches.name: type
searches.descr: document | message | transaction | transaction-response | batch | batch-response | history | searchset | collection
